an5.100:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kosambiyaṃ viharati ghositārāme.
an5.100:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena kakudho nāma koliyaputto āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa upaṭṭhāko adhunākālaṅkato aññataraṃ manomayaṃ kāyaṃ upapanno.
an5.100:1.4: Tassa evarūpo attabhāvapaṭilābho hoti—seyyathāpi nāma dve vā tīṇi vā māgadhakāni gāmakkhettāni.
an5.100:1.5: So tena attabhāvapaṭilābhena neva attānaṃ no paraṃ byābādheti.
an5.100:2.1: Atha kho kakudho devaputto yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho kakudho devaputto āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ etadavoca:
an5.100:2.4: Sahacittuppādā ca, bhante, devadatto tassā iddhiyā parihīno”ti.
an5.100:2.6: Idaṃ vatvā āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tatthevantaradhāyi.
an5.100:3.1: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an5.100:4.1: “Kakudho nāma, bhante, koliyaputto mamaṃ upaṭṭhāko adhunākālaṅkato aññataraṃ manomayaṃ kāyaṃ upapanno hoti.
an5.100:4.2: Tassa evarūpo attabhāvapaṭilābho—seyyathāpi nāma dve vā tīṇi vā māgadhakāni gāmakkhettāni.
an5.100:4.3: So tena attabhāvapaṭilābhena neva attānaṃ no paraṃ byābādheti.
an5.100:4.4: Atha kho, bhante, kakudho devaputto yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā maṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho, bhante, kakudho devaputto maṃ etadavoca:
an5.100:4.7: Sahacittuppādā ca, bhante, devadatto tassā iddhiyā parihīno’ti.
an5.100:4.9: Idaṃ vatvā maṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tatthevantaradhāyī”ti.
an5.100:5.1: “Kiṃ pana te, moggallāna, kakudho devaputto cetasā ceto paricca vidito:
an5.100:5.2: ‘yaṃ kiñci kakudho devaputto bhāsati sabbaṃ taṃ tatheva hoti, no aññathā’”ti?
an5.100:5.3: “Cetasā ceto paricca vidito me, bhante, kakudho devaputto:
an5.100:5.4: ‘yaṃ kiñci kakudho devaputto bhāsati sabbaṃ taṃ tatheva hoti, no aññathā’”ti.
an5.100:5.7: Idāni so moghapuriso attanāva attānaṃ pātukarissati.
an5.100:6.1: Pañcime, moggallāna, satthāro santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an5.100:6.3: Idha, moggallāna, ekacco satthā aparisuddhasīlo samāno ‘parisuddhasīlomhī’ti paṭijānāti ‘parisuddhaṃ me sīlaṃ pariyodātaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhan’ti.
an5.100:6.5: ‘ayaṃ kho bhavaṃ satthā aparisuddhasīlo samāno parisuddhasīlomhī’ti paṭijānāti ‘parisuddhaṃ me sīlaṃ pariyodātaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhan’ti.
an5.100:6.6: Mayañceva kho pana gihīnaṃ āroceyyāma, nāssassa manāpaṃ.
an5.100:6.7: Yaṃ kho panassa amanāpaṃ, kathaṃ naṃ mayaṃ tena samudācareyyāma:
an5.100:6.9: yaṃ tumo karissati tumova tena paññāyissatī’ti.
an5.100:6.10: Evarūpaṃ kho, moggallāna, satthāraṃ sāvakā sīlato rakkhanti;
an5.100:6.11: evarūpo ca pana satthā sāvakehi sīlato rakkhaṃ paccāsīsati. (1)
an5.100:7.1: Puna caparaṃ, moggallāna, idhekacco satthā aparisuddhājīvo samāno ‘parisuddhājīvomhī’ti paṭijānāti ‘parisuddho me ājīvo pariyodāto asaṅkiliṭṭho’ti.
an5.100:7.3: ‘ayaṃ kho bhavaṃ satthā aparisuddhājīvo samāno parisuddhājīvomhī’ti paṭijānāti ‘parisuddho me ājīvo pariyodāto asaṅkiliṭṭho’ti.
an5.100:7.4: Mayañceva kho pana gihīnaṃ āroceyyāma, nāssassa manāpaṃ.
an5.100:7.5: Yaṃ kho panassa amanāpaṃ, kathaṃ naṃ mayaṃ tena samudācareyyāma:
an5.100:7.7: yaṃ tumo karissati tumova tena paññāyissatī’ti.
an5.100:7.8: Evarūpaṃ kho, moggallāna, satthāraṃ sāvakā ājīvato rakkhanti;
an5.100:7.9: evarūpo ca pana satthā sāvakehi ājīvato rakkhaṃ paccāsīsati. (2)
an5.100:8.1: Puna caparaṃ, moggallāna, idhekacco satthā aparisuddhadhammadesano samāno ‘parisuddhadhammadesanomhī’ti paṭijānāti ‘parisuddhā me dhammadesanā pariyodātā asaṅkiliṭṭhā’ti.
an5.100:8.3: ‘ayaṃ kho bhavaṃ satthā aparisuddhadhammadesano samāno parisuddhadhammadesanomhī’ti paṭijānāti ‘parisuddhā me dhammadesanā pariyodātā asaṅkiliṭṭhā’ti.
an5.100:8.4: Mayañceva kho pana gihīnaṃ āroceyyāma, nāssassa manāpaṃ.
an5.100:8.5: Yaṃ kho panassa amanāpaṃ, kathaṃ naṃ mayaṃ tena samudācareyyāma:
an5.100:8.7: yaṃ tumo karissati tumova tena paññāyissatī’ti.
an5.100:8.8: Evarūpaṃ kho, moggallāna, satthāraṃ sāvakā dhammadesanato rakkhanti;
an5.100:8.9: evarūpo ca pana satthā sāvakehi dhammadesanato rakkhaṃ paccāsīsati. (3)
an5.100:9.1: Puna caparaṃ, moggallāna, idhekacco satthā aparisuddhaveyyākaraṇo samāno ‘parisuddhaveyyākaraṇomhī’ti paṭijānāti ‘parisuddhaṃ me veyyākaraṇaṃ pariyodātaṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhan’ti.
an5.100:9.3: ‘ayaṃ kho bhavaṃ satthā aparisuddhaveyyākaraṇo samāno parisuddhaveyyākaraṇomhī’ti paṭijānāti ‘parisuddhaṃ me veyyākaraṇaṃ pariyodātaṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhan’ti.
an5.100:9.4: Mayañceva kho pana gihīnaṃ āroceyyāma, nāssassa manāpaṃ.
an5.100:9.5: Yaṃ kho panassa amanāpaṃ, kathaṃ naṃ mayaṃ tena samudācareyyāma:
an5.100:9.7: yaṃ tumo karissati tumova tena paññāyissatī’ti.
an5.100:9.8: Evarūpaṃ kho, moggallāna, satthāraṃ sāvakā veyyākaraṇato rakkhanti;
an5.100:9.9: evarūpo ca pana satthā sāvakehi veyyākaraṇato rakkhaṃ paccāsīsati. (4)
an5.100:10.1: Puna caparaṃ, moggallāna, idhekacco satthā aparisuddhañāṇadassano samāno ‘parisuddhañāṇadassanomhī’ti paṭijānāti ‘parisuddhaṃ me ñāṇadassanaṃ pariyodātaṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhan’ti.
an5.100:10.3: ‘ayaṃ kho bhavaṃ satthā aparisuddhañāṇadassano samāno parisuddhañāṇadassanomhī’ti paṭijānāti ‘parisuddhaṃ me ñāṇadassanaṃ pariyodātaṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhan’ti.
an5.100:10.4: Mayañceva kho pana gihīnaṃ āroceyyāma, nāssassa manāpaṃ.
an5.100:10.5: Yaṃ kho panassa amanāpaṃ, kathaṃ naṃ mayaṃ tena samudācareyyāma:
an5.100:10.7: yaṃ tumo karissati tumova tena paññāyissatī’ti.
an5.100:10.8: Evarūpaṃ kho, moggallāna, satthāraṃ sāvakā ñāṇadassanato rakkhanti;
an5.100:10.9: evarūpo ca pana satthā sāvakehi ñāṇadassanato rakkhaṃ paccāsīsati.
an5.100:10.10: Ime kho, moggallāna, pañca satthāro santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ. (5)
an5.100:11.1: Ahaṃ kho pana, moggallāna, parisuddhasīlo samāno ‘parisuddhasīlomhī’ti paṭijānāmi ‘parisuddhaṃ me sīlaṃ pariyodātaṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhan’ti.
an5.100:11.2: Na ca maṃ sāvakā sīlato rakkhanti, na cāhaṃ sāvakehi sīlato rakkhaṃ paccāsīsāmi.
an5.100:11.3: Parisuddhājīvo samāno ‘parisuddhājīvomhī’ti paṭijānāmi ‘parisuddho me ājīvo pariyodāto asaṅkiliṭṭho’ti.
an5.100:11.4: Na ca maṃ sāvakā ājīvato rakkhanti, na cāhaṃ sāvakehi ājīvato rakkhaṃ paccāsīsāmi.
an5.100:11.5: Parisuddhadhammadesano samāno ‘parisuddhadhammadesanomhī’ti paṭijānāmi ‘parisuddhā me dhammadesanā pariyodātā asaṅkiliṭṭhā’ti.
an5.100:11.6: Na ca maṃ sāvakā dhammadesanato rakkhanti, na cāhaṃ sāvakehi dhammadesanato rakkhaṃ paccāsīsāmi.
an5.100:11.7: Parisuddhaveyyākaraṇo samāno ‘parisuddhaveyyākaraṇomhī’ti paṭijānāmi ‘parisuddhaṃ me veyyākaraṇaṃ pariyodātaṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhan’ti.
an5.100:11.8: Na ca maṃ sāvakā veyyākaraṇato rakkhanti, na cāhaṃ sāvakehi veyyākaraṇato rakkhaṃ paccāsīsāmi.
an5.100:11.9: Parisuddhañāṇadassano samāno ‘parisuddhañāṇadassanomhī’ti paṭijānāmi ‘parisuddhaṃ me ñāṇadassanaṃ pariyodātaṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhan’ti.
an5.100:11.10: Na ca maṃ sāvakā ñāṇadassanato rakkhanti, na cāhaṃ sāvakehi ñāṇadassanato rakkhaṃ paccāsīsāmī”ti.
